alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN PASSAIC...BERGEN AND ROCKLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Paramus, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paterson, Passaic, Hackensack, Bergenfield, Paramus, Ridgewood, Nanuet, Ramsey, Englewood, Hawthorne, Pearl River, Oradell, Clifton, Teaneck, and Fair Lawn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen
